concept.title: CMM support for control the subscriber to make one PDP per subscriber per APN (Feature f10189-01)
concept.shortdesc: This feature enhances the CMM behavior to control the subscriber to activate one PDP connection for the same APN.

conbody.p: This feature provides the option to control if the UE can have only one or multiple PDP connections for the same APN.

When the global parameter singlePdpPerApnSgsn is set to True, the subscriber has only one active primary PDP connection towards the same APN. On primary PDP connection activation, the CMM SGSN call processing uses this global parameter to decide whether the PDP connection towards the same APN is allowed or not.
The second PDP connection by the same subscriber with the same APN is rejected.
conbody.note: The CMM SGSN checks the APN after any possible correction is performed on it as part of the APN conversion and correction (SG02215) feature.
